SKU: 顏色: 紫色尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: I liked the length of the shirt. Some manufacturers forget that some women still want to cover their but. This one had good coverage. Im 5’2” I usually wear size 14-16 (depending on the name brand). I bought the xl. It was flattering. Fit good. The purple is pretty. There was something about this shirt that gave me an old lady vibe when I put it on. Maybe the flowers? The color? Or it’s made of a thick polyester. I wore it once and although it was stretchy and comfortable it was also extremely warm. If it was a cotton blend It would probably be okay for me. I’ve had plenty of opportunities to wear it again and I keep passing to something else in my closet. I did not return it since my husband and teen daughter (who is usually brutally honest) both said it was nice on me. If I had to ask if it made me look old then I probably should’ve just returned it.

商品名稱: MAYAMANG 女款 花卉 長版 上衣 休閒 襯衫 V領 短袖 鈕扣 T恤
留言內容: I ordered this top in both the black & white pattern, and the purple. The black & white arrived first which I immediately loved,  and couldn’t wait for the purple to arrive.  My only word of caution regarding the black & white is that it is actually navy blue & white.  I happen to be a fan of navy blue, so this was a non-issue for me.In regards to the purple one, I wasn’t as lucky.  The first one arrived and although I loved it, the top button didn’t line up with the hole.  This left a noticeable protrusion in the material sitting right in the center of my chest.  I quickly reordered, and the 2nd purple shirt had buttons that lined up, but it was tight across this area causing the material to be stretched and pull at the buttons.  The material was stretched so much, that the purple now looked white in that area.  I ordered a 3rd purple shirt and this one fit well across the buttoned chest, but from the chest down, it fit as if it were actually one size larger.  Ultimately I opted to try one more time, and ordered a 4th purple shirt.  Well, this one ended up being the winner, but it has imperfections too.  The upper back should be solid purple, but it has a few little white speckles where the dye was not done properly.  At this point I contemplated just repositioning the button on shirt #1, but then I thought I probably couldn’t match the tread exactly, and once repositioned, the buttons would no longer be evenly spaced, and that might look odd.  In the end, I decided to keep shirt #4 with the white speckles figuring it fit well, that I would not have to make any alterations.  Hopefully since the shirt has the floral pattern, the speckles will just blend in.  I am a petite woman 5’2.5” tall 127 lbs natural 36DD and I ordered a size small.  The medium would have been too large for me.  If you have a smaller chest then perhaps you won’t encounter the fit issues I experienced.  Despite the manufacturing inconsistencies, I still like the shirt and intend to purchase the long sleeve version.  The black & white one washed well, and I expect the same from the purple.  I do not know if there are any issues with the other colors or patterns offered.  Good Luck and Enjoy!

商品名稱: MAYAMANG 女款 花卉 長版 上衣 休閒 襯衫 V領 短袖 鈕扣 T恤
SKU: 顏色: 紫色尺寸: Small

商品名稱: MAYAMANG 女款 花卉 長版 上衣 休閒 襯衫 V領 短袖 鈕扣 T恤
SKU: 顏色: 綠色+藍色尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: Love this shirt!  The colors are beautiful and vibrant, just like the picture, and it appears to be well made.  It hangs very nicely and isn't clingy at all.  It has a nice look for a casual outing, or can be dressed up a bit with cute capris or slacks and some cute shoes. And the best part is that the fabric is SO soft and comfortable.  It is 95% polyester blend so I expected it might be a little warm, as poly doesn't always breathe well,  but it actually feels like a light-mwdium weight cotton and it stays pretty cool... even on hot days here in the South.  I have already worn and washed it 3 times and it seems to hold up well. I put it in the dryer just long enough to release the wrinkles and then hang it up to dry the rest of the way.  So far, this works very well, requires no ironing, and the shirt seems to be maintaining color and structure very well.  Want to order more in other colors!

商品名稱: MAYAMANG 女款 花卉 長版 上衣 休閒 襯衫 V領 短袖 鈕扣 T恤
SKU: 顏色: 紮染圓形綠色尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: I just received this top and only tried it on,  have not worn it anywhere yet. The material is very soft and I did have the thought that it would make a comfy nightshirt. I wish I had ordered a size smaller because it is quite loose through the body area. I am hoping it will look good with white shorts in the summer. It arrived quite wrinkled, I hope that once in the washer and dryer that isn't going to be a problem because I abhor ironing anything---hence, my thoughts of making it a nightshirt that won't require ironing. I purchased 2 different colors of this top, my thoughts here apply to both tops.
